LanguageData.Xenophobia.degreeDatas.0.label: xenophobe
LanguageData.Xenophobia.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
LanguageData.Xenophobia.degreeDatas.1.label: xenophile
LanguageData.Xenophobia.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
